span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是呼叫要檢查的授權設定的 Web 組件控制項的初始方法控制項。The method is the initial method called by the Web Parts control set to check authorization for a control. 它可接受`webPart`做為參數，並開始才是最終決定控制項是否會加入至網頁的處理序。It accepts `webPart` as a parameter, and begins a process that ultimately determines whether the control will be added to a page. 直接呼叫這個方法從程式碼時，您必須判斷是否授權指定的控制項。Call this method from your code directly when you need to determine whether a given control is authorized. 這個方法會決定控制項是否會繼承的初始工作執行類別或控制，而且如果是這樣，何種類型的子控制項，它包含。This method carries out the initial tasks of determining whether the control inherits from the class or is a control and, if so, what type of child control it contains. 若要完成工作的授權，它會呼叫方法多載。To finish the task of authorization, it calls the overload method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫從您的程式碼，以判斷是否授權控制項加入至頁面的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method from your code to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 自訂會覆寫控制項方法。A custom control that overrides the method. - 建立的篩選條件的網頁控制項。A Web page that creates a filter for a control. - 如何執行此程式碼範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 這個程式碼範例會使用自訂會覆寫控制項多載方法，以提供自訂處理屬性。This code example uses a custom control that overrides the overload method to provide custom handling of the property. 這個控制項的屬性值會檢查`admin`而且，如果值存在，即表示授權控制項。This control checks for a property value of `admin` and, if the value is present, authorizes the control. 如果控制項具有不同的值，它未獲授權。不使用屬性值的控制項授權的因為它們假設為篩選案例的一部分。If a control has a different value, it is not authorized; controls without the property value are authorized as well, as they are presumed not to be part of the filtering scenario. 若要執行此程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For this code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第二個部分會建立篩選器，可能可以排除控制項。The second part of the code example creates a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 在下列網頁包含三個中的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項``項目。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 請注意，第一個和第二個控制項都有其屬性設定為不同的值，和第三個未指派給屬性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 在執行階段，能夠檢查這個授權值和控制項可以加入至頁面，如果篩選條件符合時，開發人員所設定的準則。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. 也請注意在`Page_Load`方法]、 [程式碼會呼叫方法，以判斷是否每個控制項已獲得授權，然後如果因此，它會設定每個控制項屬性。Notice also that in the `Page_Load` method, the code calls the method to determine whether each of the controls is authorized, and if so, it sets each control's property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 請注意，工作的程式碼範例，您必須新增設定，若要啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案的 Web.config 檔案中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請確定沒有``具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 載入瀏覽器中的之後，請注意，會顯示第一個控制項，因為它會比對的準則中覆寫的方法。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二個控制項不會加入至頁面，因為它篩選所排除的。The second control is not added to the page, because it is excluded by the filter. 也加入第三個控制項，因為它並沒有其屬性集。The third control is also added, because it does not have its property set. 請注意，如果您按一下標題列的其中一個控制項中的動詞命令功能表圖示時，他們可以同時匯出，因為其各自沒有指派屬性值。Notice that if you click the verbs menu icon in the title bar of either control, they can both be exported because their respective property values were assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 多載方法會判斷是否授權控制項加入至頁面的最後一個步驟執行。The overload method carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 此方法可確保`type`是有效的類型，而`path`正在檢查的控制項是一個使用者控制項時，才會有值。The method ensures that `type` is a valid type, and that `path` has a value only if the control being checked is a user control. 然後它會呼叫的重大方法，這會引發事件。Then it calls the critical method, which raises the event. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何覆寫方法，以判斷是否授權控制項加入至頁面。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 第一個步驟是建立篩選器，可能可以排除控制項。The first step is to create a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 在下列網頁包含三個中的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項``項目。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 請注意，第一個和第二個控制項都有其屬性設定為不同的值，和第三個未指派給屬性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 在執行階段，能夠檢查這個授權值和控制項可以加入至頁面，如果篩選條件符合時，開發人員所設定的準則。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 第二個步驟就是覆寫方法，並建立自訂授權篩選條件的處理。The second step is to override the method, and create custom handling for authorization filters. 請注意，程式碼會先檢查屬性是否有值，以便任何控制，不會指派屬性會自動加入。Note that the code first checks whether the property has a value, so that any control that does not assign the property will be added automatically. 如果控制項有篩選，則程式碼會傳回`true`才篩選值等於`admin`。If a control has a filter, the code returns `true` only if the filter value is equal to `admin`. 這將示範一個簡單的機制，您可以使用特定的控制項，顯示特定使用者，根據其角色。This demonstrates a simple mechanism you can use for displaying certain controls to certain users, depending on their role. 超出本主題的範圍使用角色的完整範例時，您可以使用相同的邏輯當做覆寫的方法，在此程式碼範例中，只不過您無法檢查目前使用者是否在符合授權篩選值的角色然後再加入控制項，僅對該使用者。While a full example using roles is beyond the scope of this topic, you could use the same logic as the overridden method in this code example, except that you could check whether the current user is in a role that matches the authorization filter value, and then add the control only for that user. 這會讓您建立的頁面，其中有些使用者會看到所有控制項，而其他使用者將會都看到選取的控制項。This would enable you to create pages where some users would see all the controls, and other users would see only selected controls. 這是使用角色時檢查篩選條件的邏輯的可能外觀：This is how the logic that checks the filter might look if you used roles: ```vb If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter) Then return True Else return False End If ``` ```csharp if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter)) return true; else return false; ``` 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 載入瀏覽器中的之後，請注意，會顯示第一個控制項，因為它會比對的準則中覆寫的方法。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二個控制項不會加入至網頁，因為其篩選值被排除。The second control is not added to the page, because its filter value is excluded. 加入第三個控制項，因為它並沒有其屬性集。The third control is added, because it does not have its property set. 如果您變更屬性值，第二個控制項來比對的第一個控制項，並再重新執行頁面上，也會加入第二個控制項。If you change the property value on the second control to match that of the first control, and then run the page again, the second control is added as well.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制使用內部追蹤是否有任何它所管理的頁面層級個人化資料的屬性已變更。The control uses the property internally to track whether any of the page-level personalization data that it manages has changed. 個人化資料變更時的使用者執行各種不同的個人化動作，在頁面層級，例如加入或移除連線或中斷連線的控制項，變更頁面的版面配置，藉由移動控制項和其他動作的控制項。The personalization data changes when users carry out various personalization actions at the page level, such as adding or removing controls, connecting or disconnecting controls, changing the page's layout by moving controls, and other actions. > [!NOTE] > 使用者也可以執行控制層級，這表示它們進行個人化變更，到特定控制項，在個人化，所做的變更只影響該控制項。Users can also perform personalization at the control level, which means that they make personalization changes to a specific control, and the changes affect only that control. 範例會編輯控制項，並變更其標題文字或它的背景色彩。An example would be editing the control and changing its title text, or its background color. 控制層級個人化不會影響所追蹤的頁面層級個人化資料控制項，所以屬性值不會變更為`true`控制層級個人化就會發生。Control-level personalization does not affect the page-level personalization data tracked by the control, and so the property value is not changed to `true` when control-level personalization occurs. 雖然方法受到保護，而且呼叫端，無法直接存取直接的呼叫端，才能存取內容，並傳回這個屬性的值。Although the method is protected and cannot be accessed directly by a caller, the property can be accessed directly by callers, and it returns the value of this property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供儲存的狀態資料的形式物件。The method provides saved state data in the form of a object. 將 Web 組件控制項載入個人化資料，以及執行其他初始設定工作，最終會使用此資料。This data is eventually used to load personalization data into the Web Parts controls and to perform other initialization tasks. > [!NOTE] > 方法的序列，開始時呼叫這個方法是方法一開始會要求相關聯要個人化資料提供給物件控制項。This method is called by a sequence of methods that begins when the method initially requests the associated object to supply personalization data to the control. 您無法直接從您的程式碼呼叫此方法。You cannot call this method directly from your code. 您可以不過，直接呼叫方法，而其本身會呼叫方法並傳回個人化資料。You can, however, directly call the method, which itself calls the method and returns the personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制使用方法來移動`webPart`到新位置位於相同區域中，或在不同區域中。The control uses the method to move `webPart` to a new location in the same zone, or in a different zone. 您可以直接從程式碼，呼叫這個方法，它也會叫用時，使用者將控制項移到新位置，使用 Web 組件的使用者介面 (UI) 中的各種選項。You can call this method directly from code, and it is also invoked when a user moves a control to a new position using various options in the Web Parts user interface (UI). 之前必須符合一些條件`webPart`可以移動，和其中大部分以本主題中的例外狀況 > 一節中所列的項目。A number of conditions must be met before `webPart` can be moved, and most of these are indicated by items listed in the Exceptions section of this topic. 如果`webPart`並未包含在區域不能將它移到區域的開始。If `webPart` was not contained in a zone to begin with, it cannot be moved into a zone. 下列動作順序已符合這些條件之後，就會移動`webPart`:After the conditions have been met, the following sequence of actions occurs to move `webPart`: 1. 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 2. `webPart` 移除從其目前的區域 （如有必要），並加入至其新的區域或其目前區域中的新位置。`webPart` is removed from its current zone (if necessary), and added to its new zone or new position within its current zone. 3. 方法會引發 事件。The method raises the event. 4. `zoneIndex`的每個來源和目的地的區域中的控制項重設為反映已移動的控制項。The `zoneIndex` of every control in both the origin and destination zones is reset to reflect the moved control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法，直接從程式碼，以移動到另一個區域的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method directly from code to move a control from one zone to another. 程式碼範例包含三個部分：The code example has three parts: - 變更顯示模式的使用者控制項。A user control for changing display modes. - 裝載控制項的網頁。A Web page to host the controls. - 如何執行此程式碼範例的說明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以從範例 > 一節的取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 如需顯示模式和使用者控制項的運作方式的詳細資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 此範例的第二個部分是包含兩個區域，其中每一個都包含兩個伺服器控制項 Web 網頁。The second part of the example is a Web page that contains two zones, each of which contains two server controls. 當使用者按一下**移動 WebPart**在頁面上中的程式碼的按鈕`Button1_Click`方法將控制項從第一個區域移至第二個區域中的新位置。When a user clicks the **Move WebPart** button on the page, the code in the `Button1_Click` method moves a control from the first zone to a new position in the second zone. 請注意，程式碼第一次必須呼叫方法來擷取包裝物件`list1`控制項。Notice that the code first must call the method to retrieve the object that wraps the `list1` control. 這是必要的因為第一個參數方法需要控制項，而`list1`是 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。This is required because the first parameter of the method requires a control, whereas `list1` is an ASP.NET server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/CS/MoveWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/VB/MoveWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 在頁面載入之後，請按一下**移動 WebPart** 按鈕，並請注意，包含連結控制項移到第二個區域中的中間位置。After the page loads, click the **Move WebPart** button, and note that the control that contains the links moves into the middle position in the second zone. 此控制項的移動作業透過以程式設計方式呼叫方法。This movement of the control is accomplished programmatically by calling the method. 您也可以使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，將頁面切換到設計模式，並在設計模式中，您可以將控制項拖曳到不同的區域或其區域的不同位置。You can also use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode, and in design mode, you can drag the controls to different zones or different positions within their zones. 方法也會呼叫控制項來處理這類使用者起始移動。The method is also called by the control to handle such user-initiated moves.

summary.span: Raises the event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.

span.span: Raises the event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法透過呼叫方法，當授權，以加入至頁面選取控制項。The method is called by the method, when a control is being checked for authorization to be added to a page. 當呼叫方法時，便會產生事件和事件處理常式方法時，它會叫用處理常式。When the method is called, it raises the event, and if there is a handler method for the event, it invokes the handler. 授權程序控制項是一個重要的 Web 組件功能。The process of authorizing controls is an important Web Parts feature. 每個或加入至依區域的伺服器控制項控制項將會執行授權程序，以判斷是否可以加入控制項。Every or server control that is added to a zone by the control goes through an authorization process to determine whether the control can be added. 根據預設，Web 組件控制項集合不提供任何篩選準則，以避免將控制項加入至區域。By default, the Web Parts control set does not provide any filtering criteria to prevent controls from being added to a zone. 但控制項集合並提供所需的開發人員建立自己的篩選條件的機制。But the control set does provide the mechanisms necessary for developers to create their own filtering criteria. 藉由使用這些機制，您可以建立自訂的篩選案例。By using these mechanisms, you can create custom filtering scenarios. 比方說，您可以建立篩選，以便使用者是系統管理員角色中，如果特定的控制項，會加入至區域時轉譯頁面時，如果使用者是使用者角色中，將不會加入這些控制項。For example, you could create a filter so that, if a user is in an administrator role, certain controls would be added to a zone when the page is rendered, and if the user is in a user role, those controls would not be added. 篩選控制項授權程序期間的機制是屬性控制項，和方法，而事件控制項。The mechanisms for filtering controls during the authorization process are the property on controls, the and methods, and the event on the control. 若要建立篩選的案例，有本質上這兩個工作。To create a filtering scenario, there are essentially two tasks. 首先，您指派字串每個屬性您想要篩選的控制項。First, you assign strings to the property of each control you want to filter. 這些字串值可以是任意的但應該包含您想要篩選的準則。These string values can be arbitrary, but they should contain the criteria you want to filter on. 例如，如果您要指定的控制項来新增至區域的只有當系統管理員使用者檢視頁面上，則您可能會指定的字串值`admin`屬性。For example, if you wanted a given control to be added to a zone only if an administrator user is viewing the page, then you might assign a string value of `admin` to the property. 您無法使用 ASP.NET 角色功能，然後將您的站台的所有使用者都加入至不同的角色，例如系統管理員、 管理員和使用者。Then you could use the ASP.NET roles feature, and add all users of your site to various roles such as administrator, manager, and user. 當網頁載入時，您篩選程式碼會檢查使用者的角色，請比較檢查，在控制項上的授權篩選值，且使用者是系統管理員角色中的 （例如），而您必須設定控制項的的值`admin`，無法加入控制項。When a page is loading, your filtering code would check what role a user is in, compare it to the authorization filter value on a control being checked, and if (for example) the user is in an administrator role and you had set the control's value to `admin`, the control could be added. 建立篩選案例的第二個步驟是撰寫程式碼來檢查屬性值上控制項，並判斷是否要在加入其區域之前，授權的每個控制項。The second step in creating a filtering scenario is to write code to check the property values on controls, and determine whether each control is authorized before it is added to its zone. 有兩種方式來放置這個篩選程式碼的位置。There are two options for where to place this filtering code. 第一個選項是針對網頁開發人員慣用的選項。The first option is the preferred option for page developers. 您可以建立方法以處理直接在網頁伺服器指令碼，或程式碼分隔檔案中的事件。You can create a method to handle the event directly in the Web page server script code, or in a code separation file. 與事件關聯您的方法，藉由新增`OnAuthorizeWebPart`屬性的標記控制項在頁面中，如下列範例的標記程式碼所示。Associate your method with the event by adding the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the tag for the control in the page, as shown in the following sample markup code. ``` ``` 所有您的自訂方法需要為每個 check控制篩選準則，然後根據結果，布林值指派給屬性物件，表示是否控制項都可以是加入。All your custom method has to do is check each control for the filtering criteria and then, based on the results, assign a Boolean value to the property of the object to indicate whether the control can be added. 範例 > 一節中的程式碼會示範如何執行這項操作。The code in the Example section demonstrates how to do this. 放置您篩選程式碼的第二個選項是繼承自類別，並覆寫檢查篩選準則的方法。The second option for where to place your filtering code is to inherit from the class, and override a method to check the filter criteria. 您可以覆寫以執行此兩種方法方法或方法。The two methods you can override to do this are the method or the method. 雖然可行哪一種方法，在大部分情況下最好是覆寫方法，因為它為您提供更大以程式設計方式控制整個授權程序，而方法會執行一個特定的工作也就是引發事件和處理常式的核取。Although either method would work, in most cases it is preferable to override the method, because it provides you with greater programmatic control over the whole authorization process, whereas the method does only one specific task, which is to raise the event and check for a handler. 在自訂程式碼範例類別會覆寫方法，請參閱方法多載。For a code example of a custom class that overrides the method, see the overload of the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何設定的自訂事件處理常式事件，以便處理常式能夠提供用於自訂篩選程式碼方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, so that the handler can provide custom filtering code for the method. 這個範例會提供篩選的案例和授權的網頁開發人員的典型方式將控制項加入至頁面。This example would be a typical way for a page developer to provide a filtering scenario and authorization of controls to be added to a page. 在網頁上，注意``項目具有`OnAuthorizeWebPart`屬性指派給它的事件處理常式的名稱。In the Web page, notice that the `` element has the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute with the name of the event handler assigned to it. 這個方法會檢查是否有其各自的頁面上的控制項屬性值設定為`admin`而且，如果是的話，會傳回`true`，這表示，會獲得授權，會加入至頁面。The method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `admin` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. > [!NOTE] > 請注意，控制項沒有任何值指派給屬性加入，因為會假設它們不是篩選案例的一部分。Note that controls that do not have any value assigned to the property are added as well, because they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario. 這是常見的方法是篩選案例中： 某些控制項進行篩選，和其他項目不會因為它們都假設為可供所有使用者。This would be a common approach in a filtering scenario: some controls would be filtered, and others would not be, because they are presumed to be available for all users. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 設定使用者角色已超出本主題的範圍，因為此程式碼範例不會檢查在篩選中的使用者角色。Because setting up users in roles is beyond the scope of this topic, this code example does not check user roles in the filtering. 不過，篩選控制項，根據使用者角色的案例很可能是其中一個最常見的用途，此篩選的功能之一。However, the scenario of filtering controls according to user roles is likely to be one of the most common uses of this filtering feature. 如果您有角色上您的網站，而且您想要檢查這個方法，以篩選控制項中的使用者角色，方法就會類似下列程式碼區塊 （相對於上述的程式碼範例不使用角色中更簡單的方法）。If you have roles on your site, and you want to check user roles in this method to filter controls, the method would resemble the following code block (versus the simpler approach in the preceding code example, which does not use roles). ```vb Protected Sub WebPartManager1_AuthorizeWebPart(ByVal sender _ As Object, ByVal e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs) If String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter) Then If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, _ e.AuthorizationFilter) Then e.IsAuthorized = True Else e.IsAuthorized = False End If End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart(object sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e) { if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter)) { if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, e.authorizationFilter)) e.IsAuthorized = true; else e.IsAuthorized = false; } } ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其基底中的方法會形成只會引發事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

para.span: 您可以覆寫方法。

span.span: You can override the method.

para.span: 例如，變更後的顯示模式，可能會想要變更使用者介面 (UI)，根據哪個顯示器中包含模式的外觀中的項目屬性。

span.span: For example, after a change of display mode, you might want to change something in the appearance of the user interface (UI), depending on which display mode is contained in the property.

para.span: 或者，您可能想要隱藏特定內容，或顯示特定的控制項。

span.span: Or you might want to hide certain content, or display a certain control.

para.span: 當您覆寫此方法時，您通常應該呼叫基底的方法覆寫的方法，最後一個步驟，讓自訂程式碼會先執行，並引發事件，指出模式變更為完整。

span.span: When you override the method, you should normally call the base method as the last step of the overridden method, so that your custom code runs first, and the event is raised last, indicating that the mode change is complete.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 其基底中的方法會形成只會引發事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

para.span: 您可以覆寫方法。

span.span: You can override the method.

para.span: 比方說，會顯示模式已變更，您可能想要檢查新的顯示模式將會 (使用屬性) 並在使用者介面 (UI)，根據新的顯示模式將會進行一些變更。

span.span: For example, as a display mode is changing, you might want to check what the new display mode will be (by using the property) and change something in the user interface (UI) based on what the new display mode will be.

para.span: 如果您有自訂的顯示模式，您可能想要顯示特定的控制項，如果自訂模式即將成為新的顯示模式。

span.span: If you had a custom display mode, you might want to make certain controls visible if the custom mode is going to be the new display mode.

para.span: 當您覆寫這個方法時，您通常應該呼叫基底方法的第一個步驟，在覆寫的方法，如此就會引發事件指出正在開始變更顯示模式。

span.span: When you override this method, you should normally call the base method as the first step of the overridden method, so that the event is raised to indicate a display mode is starting to change.

para.span: 然後，自訂程式碼可以進行變更使用者介面 (UI) 中新的顯示模式實際上不會顯示之前。

span.span: Then, your custom code can make changes in the user interface (UI) before the new display mode is actually displayed.

summary.span: Raises the event, which occurs after a control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.

span.span: Raises the event, which occurs after a control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發事件，通常是在開發人員可能會想要變更的使用者介面 (UI) 外觀的時間點。The method raises the event, which is typically a point in time where a developer might want to change the appearance of the user interface (UI). 例如，當新選取控制項，Web 組件控制項設定變更新選取的控制項的呈現。For example, when a new control is selected, the Web Parts control set changes the rendering of the newly selected control. 會清除控制項的選取範圍之後，轉譯會恢復正常。After a control's selection is cleared, the rendering is returned to normal. 使用者選取特定之後控制項進行編輯，方法呼叫。After a user selects a particular control for editing, the method is called. 當使用者完成編輯控制項，並以結果，會清除控制項的選取範圍，就會關閉它，再次呼叫方法。When the user finishes editing the control and closes it, with the result that the control's selection is cleared, the method is called again.

para.span: 有幾個選項相關事件，可讓開發人員自訂轉譯的變更所選的控制項後，就會發生。

span.span: There are several options related to the event, to allow developers to customize the rendering that occurs after the selected control has changed.

para.span: 宣告式程式碼中，內項目，您可以設定屬性，並指派給它的自訂方法的名稱。

span.span: In declarative code, within the element you could set the attribute, and assign to it the name of a custom method.

para.span: 在自訂的方法中，您可以修改所選控制項的呈現事件發生時。

span.span: In the custom method, you could modify the rendering of the selected controls when the event occurs.

para.span: 另一個選項是繼承自類別並覆寫此方法。

span.span: Another option is to inherit from the class and override the method.

para.span: 第三個選項是以自訂轉譯在區域層級;例如，您可以繼承自類別，並覆寫其方法，以自訂控制項選取和編輯程序期間已清除的呈現。

span.span: A third option is to customize the rendering at the zone level; for example, you can inherit from the class, and override its method, to customize the rendering of controls selected and cleared during the editing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會引發事件，表示控制項 （或其他伺服器或使用者控制項） 已成功關閉頁面上。The method raises the event to indicate that a control (or other server or user control) has been successfully closed on a page. 若要關閉控制是指從頁面移除，而不轉譯時，也將它放在特殊持有物件稱為頁面類別目錄。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 頁面目錄中，對應至控制項，維護參考至已關閉每一頁的控制項。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果宣告內的頁面上的控制項區域，使用者可以將頁面切換成類別目錄的顯示模式，並將任何先前已關閉的控制項加入至網頁。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add back to the page any controls that were previously closed. 方法提供機會讓開發人員建立的自訂處理常式事件。The method provides an opportunity for developers to create a custom handler for the event. 網頁開發人員可以加入，將自訂事件處理常式`OnWebPartClosed`屬性``項目 頁面上，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 開發人員可能會在這個方法中執行的一個有用工作用來顯示關閉的控制項取代的預留位置，完成與工具提示，告知使用者如何將控制項加入至網頁。One useful task a developer might carry out in this method is to display a placeholder in place of the closed control, complete with a ToolTip that would inform users how to add the control back to the page.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Personalization As WebPartPersonalization

summary.span: Gets a reference to an object that contains personalization data for a Web page.

span.span: Gets a reference to an object that contains personalization data for a Web page.

value.span: A包含個人化資料。

span.span: A that contains personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可用來存取逐頁檢視相關聯的物件控制項。The property provides a way to access the object that is associated with a page through the control. 您可以使用這個屬性，存取個人化物件的各種不同的成員。Using this property, you can access the various members of the personalization object. 例如，您可以使用方法切換網頁的個人化範圍從共用的使用者領域，反之亦然。For example, you can use the method to switch the page's personalization scope from shared to user scope, or vice versa. 是否在哪一個提供者用於個人化資料，以及其他的頁面上，甚至啟用個人化，您也可以找出目前個人化範圍的頁面。You can also find out the current personalization scope of the page, whether personalization is even enabled on the page, which provider is being used for the personalization data, and more. 請注意，所參考的資料屬性是只有頁面層級個人化資料所追蹤控制項。Note that the data referenced by the property is only the page-level personalization data that is tracked by the control. 控制項特定個人化資料，例如可個人化屬性的值控制，不是屬於屬性。Control-specific personalization data, such as the values of personalizable properties on controls, is not part of the property. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關 Web 組件個人化的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information on Web Parts personalization, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計的方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically. 在下列網頁可讓使用者進入編輯模式，若要編輯的特定層面控制項。The following Web page allows a user to enter edit mode to edit certain aspects of the control. **切換範圍**按鈕切換至使用者或共用個人化範圍的頁面。The **Toggle Scope** button switches the page to user or shared personalization scope. **編輯模式**和**瀏覽模式** 按鈕會分別將頁面切換成適當的顯示模式。The **Edit Mode** and **Browse Mode** buttons each switch the page into the appropriate display mode. 請注意，在`

summary.span: Saves custom personalization state data maintained by the control, so that this data can be reloaded whenever the page is reloaded.

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data maintained by the control, so that this data can be reloaded whenever the page is reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法很重要進行個人化，因為它可讓個人化的使用者設定儲存為未來的瀏覽器工作階段，並瀏覽至頁面。The method is critical in the process of personalization, because it enables personalized user settings to be stored for future browser sessions and visits to a page. 方法會將儲存自訂的個人化狀態資料，其中包含項目，如下所示： 動態或伺服器控制項加入頁面或從刪除頁面; 已移動頁面的控制項並具有動態連接已建立或刪除。The method saves custom personalization state data, which includes items such as the following: dynamic or server controls that have been added to a page or deleted from a page; controls that have been moved on a page; and dynamic connections that have been created or deleted. 您無法直接從您的程式碼呼叫此方法。You cannot call this method directly from your code. 不過，您可以呼叫方法，而其本身呼叫此方法來儲存個人化資料。You can, however, call the method, which itself calls this method to save personalization data.

para.span: 開發人員可以覆寫這個方法在衍生類別來自訂儲存個人化資料的程序。

span.span: Developers can override this method in a derived class to customize the process of saving personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SelectedWebPart As WebPart

summary.span: Gets a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control.

span.span: Gets a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control.

value.span: A編輯或建立連接的目前選取的控制項。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會傳回參考或目前未選取進行編輯或建立連接與另一個控制項的其他伺服器控制項。The property returns a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control. 控制項提供數種有用的方法和事件的處理程序的選取控制項。The control provides several useful methods and events for handling the process of selecting a control. 只選取控制項之後，但進行任何變更之前，就會發生事件。The event occurs just after a control is selected, but before any changes are made. 若要執行某些控制項上的動作之後加以選取，請覆寫方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it is selected, override the method. 比方說，您可能想要變更的控制項選取但未變更，以視覺化方式強調選取的控制項的外觀。For example, you might want to change the appearance of a control that is selected but has not changed yet, to emphasize visually which control is selected. 之後已變更選取的控制項，就會發生事件。The event occurs just after the selected control has been changed. 若要變更後執行某些控制項上的動作，請覆寫方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it has changed, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedWebPartChanged As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after the selection of one control has changed and moved to another control on a Web page.

span.span: Occurs after the selection of one control has changed and moved to another control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用於搭配方法，以變更選取的控制項的使用者介面 (UI)。This event can be used in conjunction with the method to change the user interface (UI) of a selected control. 比方說，如果使用者切換到設計模式的頁面 ()，然後選取控制項目的，是將它拖曳到新位置，通常會藉由變更色彩，例如變更的呈現方式選取的控制項，其框線或背景時選取它。For example, if the user switches the page to design mode (), and then selects a control with the intent of dragging it to a new position, it is common to change the rendering of the selected control, for example by changing the color of its border or background while it is selected. > [!NOTE] > 如需有關如何使用事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Web Form 應用程式中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

summary.span: Occurs during the process of changing which or server control is currently selected on a Web page.

span.span: Occurs during the process of changing which or server control is currently selected on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件可用於搭配方法。This event can be used in conjunction with the method. 網頁開發人員可以建立程式碼中的事件處理常式加`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`屬性`` 頁面上，並將屬性的值設定為自訂的方法名稱中的項目即將處理此事件。Page developers can create an event handler in their code by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `` element in a page, and setting the value of the attribute to the name of a custom method that will handle the event. 開始或結束連接控制項之間，以及當開始和結束的編輯控制項的程序期間，會引發這個事件。This event is raised during the process of beginning or ending a connection between controls, and when beginning and ending an edit of a control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱方法。For details, see the method. 通常，當直接結果的變更所選的控制項的使用者動作，就會引發事件，可以取消事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that changes the selected control, the event can be cancelled. 不過，是無法取消事件中的案例。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果就在刪除控制項它所包含的控制項必須全部關閉，否則它們會被遺棄。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在此情況下控制關閉控制項、 不使用者，而且它必須決定目前選取的控制項，以及何時變更選取範圍沒有任何中斷的機會，讓它能完成的清理程序所有控制項。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must determine which control is currently selected and when to change the selection without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up all the controls. 因此，根據設計方法無法在此案例中取消。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 相關事件可取消，請參閱事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetPersonalizationDirty() cil managed

summary.span: Sets a flag indicating that custom personalization data for the control has changed.

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that custom personalization data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會設定旗標，最終導致 Web 組件控制項設定為將更新的個人化資料儲存中的 個人化元件。The method sets a flag that ultimately causes the personalization components in the Web Parts control set to save the updated personalization data. 如需詳細資訊，可能會導致個人化資料所追蹤的變更之案例控制，請參閱屬性。For more information on the scenarios that can cause changes to the personalization data tracked by the control, see the property. 無法直接從您的程式碼呼叫方法，它無法覆寫，因為它供內部 Web 組件控制項設定為 Web 組件個人化功能的一部分。The method cannot be called directly from your code, and cannot be overridden, because it is used internally by the Web Parts control set as part of the Web Parts personalization feature.

para.span: 呼叫此方法由衍生類別。

span.span: The method can be called by a derived class.

para.span: 這會是很有用，如果您想要自訂的個人化的 Web 組件控制項的元件集，並因此需要控制設定個人化資料的旗標的程序。

span.span: This would be useful if you want to customize the personalization components of the Web Parts control set, and thus need to control the process of setting flags for personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetSelectedWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: A or server control that has been selected.

span.span: A or server control that has been selected.

summary.span: Sets the property value equal to the currently selected or server control.

span.span: Sets the property value equal to the currently selected or server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 開頭或結尾所指定的控制項編輯的處理序期間會呼叫方法`webPart`參數，且開頭或結尾包含連線的`webPart`。The method is called during the processes that begin or end editing of the control specified by the `webPart` parameter, and those that begin or end a connection that includes `webPart`. 編輯和連接處理程序的開頭`webPart`是已選取要編輯，或輸入連接的控制。At the beginning of the edit and connection processes, `webPart` is the control that has been selected to be edited or to enter a connection. 編輯和連接處理程序的結尾`null`傳遞至方法，會導致取消選取目前選取的控制項。At the end of the edit and connection processes, `null` is passed to the method, which results in the currently selected control no longer being selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: Gets or sets an empty string ("") so that no skin can be applied to the control.

span.span: Gets or sets an empty string ("") so that no skin can be applied to the control.

value.span: 空字串，可防止毋需指派給它的外觀的控制項。

span.span: An empty string that prevents the control from having a skin assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性會覆寫繼承屬性可防止控制項，這是不可見的控制項，從使用面板。The property overrides the inherited property to prevent the control, which is an invisible control, from using skins. 屬性的實作可防止面板指派由一律會傳回空字串從`get`存取子，並一律在嘗試設定中的值是否擲回例外狀況`set`存取子。The implementation of the property prevents a skin from being assigned by always returning an empty string from the `get` accessor, and always throwing an exception if there is an attempt to set a value in the `set` accessor.

exception.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticConnections As WebPartConnectionCollection

summary.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all objects on a Web page that are defined as static connections.

span.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all objects on a Web page that are defined as static connections.

value.span: A包含頁面上的所有靜態連接。

span.span: A that contains all the static connections on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供控制項來追蹤和管理頁面上的所有靜態連接。The property is used by the control to track and manage all static connections on a page. 靜態連接，相較於動態的連接，不必每次在呈現的頁面加入至網頁。A static connection, in contrast with a dynamic connection, does not need to be added to a page every time the page is rendered. 這個屬性所參考的集合包含所有存在的頁面，是否會在建立以程式設計方式或使用指定的靜態連接``在網頁標記中的項目。The collection referenced by this property contains all the static connections that exist on the page, whether they are created programmatically or specified with an `` element in the page's markup. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用屬性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 原始程式碼檔，其中包含兩個自訂控制項和自訂的介面。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含兩個自訂的網頁可連接控制項並``項目。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 此範例在瀏覽器中的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下列程式碼包含只網頁的部分範例。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您也要取得範例-自訂使用者控制項及原始程式碼的自訂控制項和介面-前兩個部分的範例 > 一節從類別概觀。You will also need to obtain the first two parts of the example--the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls and interface--from the Example section of the class overview. 該主題也說明您的選項來編譯控制項。That topic also explains your options for compiling the controls. 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 網頁的宣告式標記包含`Register`使用者控制項，並自訂控制項的指示詞。The declarative markup for the page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 沒有``項目，``項目來包含自訂控制項和``項目。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 請注意，在`Page_Load`方法時，程式碼是否連線已經存在，而且，如果沒有，請定義提供者、 取用者，以及其各自的連接點，會檢查並再加入新的連接所參考的靜態連接的集合屬性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 您已載入網頁瀏覽器中之後，請按一下**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項，然後選取**連接**切換頁面，即可連接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 連接模式使用``項目可讓您建立控制項之間的連接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在連接模式中，按一下標題列中的向下箭號**郵遞區號**啟動其動詞命令功能表中，控制項，然後按一下**連接**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 連接使用者介面 (UI) 出現之後，請注意連接確認已建立的程式碼中包含`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果您在更新版本的瀏覽器工作階段中傳回此頁面，此靜態連接將會建立，且不需要重新建立每次載入頁面。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportedDisplayModes As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are available on a particular Web page.

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are available on a particular Web page.

value.span: A ，其中包含一組特定網頁上可用的物件。

span.span: A that contains the set of objects available on a specific Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含僅會在頁面上，指定區域在頁面上出現的控制項種類實際可用的顯示模式。The property contains only the display modes that are actually available on a page, given the kinds of zone controls present on the page. > [!NOTE] > 顯示模式可以停用，並停用的顯示模式時，它不會加入至集合，即使對應支援顯示模式的區域類型存在於頁面上。Display modes can be disabled, and when a display mode is disabled, it is not added to the collection, even when the corresponding type of zone that supports that display mode is present on the page. 一律支援瀏覽模式和設計模式。Browse mode and design mode are always supported. 可以改變的顯示模式是編輯、 目錄和連接模式。The display modes that can vary are the edit, catalog, and connect modes. 每一種顯示模式都與特定類型的控制項。Each of these display modes is associated with a particular type of control. 它是特別具型別會造成特定的顯示模式来加入至所參考的集合在網頁上區域的存在屬性。It is the presence of that specially typed zone on a Web page that causes a particular display mode to be added to the collection referenced by the property. 例如，如果網頁包含而非區域區域，然後編輯顯示模式是其中一個支援的模式，在該頁面上，但是不支援類別目錄的顯示模式。For example, if a Web page contains an zone but not a zone, then the edit display mode is one of the supported modes on that page, but the catalog display mode is not supported. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不同於屬性，即在參考集合，其中包含所有目前可用的顯示模式控制項，即使不是支援的特定頁面。The property differs from the property, which references a collection containing all the display modes that are available to the current control, even those that are not supported on a particular page. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以程式設計方式使用的屬性。The following code example shows the programmatic use of the property. 程式碼會使用這個屬性來填入清單，只顯示可用的模式在目前的網頁。The code uses this property to populate the list with only the display modes available in the current Web page. 有三個支援此頁面上顯示模式： 瀏覽、 設計和編輯。There are three supported display modes on this page: browse, design, and edit. 前兩個一律可用，以及編輯模式是用於此程式碼範例，因為此頁面包含控制項。The first two are always available, and the edit mode is available in this code example because the page contains an control. 類別目錄和連線的顯示模式不會顯示，因為其對應的區域不在此頁面上。The catalog and connect display modes are not shown, because their corresponding zones are not on this page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/CS/wpmgrSuppDisplayModescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/VB/wpmgrSuppDisplayModesvb.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，您可以使用下拉式清單控制項切換到設計模式，將頁面從瀏覽模式，然後編輯模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode. 您可以在編輯模式中，按一下下拉式清單動詞命令功能表中的伺服器控制項的其中一個標頭，並選取**編輯**，編輯控制項。In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean Implements IPersonalizable.IsDirty

summary.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom personalization state data managed by the control has changed on a Web page.

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom personalization state data managed by the control has changed on a Web page.

value.span: 布林值，指出是否已變更個人化狀態資料。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the personalization state data has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓呼叫端若要判斷是否個人化狀態由管理的資料控制項已變更。The property provides a way for callers to determine whether personalization state data that is managed by the control has changed. 當使用者個人化頁面層級的詳細資訊，例如藉由變更頁面配置、 建立或刪除連接，並由加入或刪除控制項，管理個人化資料控制的變更。When users personalize page-level details, for example by changing page layout, creating or deleting connections, and adding or deleting controls, the personalization data managed by the control changes. 這是受保護的值傳回呼叫端傳遞方法屬性，無法直接存取的呼叫端。This is a pass-through method that returns to callers the value of the protected property, which cannot be directly accessed by callers. > [!NOTE] > 屬性不會指出是否可個人化的屬性值或個別的屬性會影響個別的外觀控制項，已經變更。The property does not indicate whether personalizable property values, or individual properties that affect the appearance of individual controls, have changed. 控制層級個人化個別追蹤每個控制項。Control-level personalization is tracked for each control individually. 屬性只會指出是否個人化資料，在頁面層級且受控制項已變更。The property indicates only whether personalization data that is at the page level and is managed by the control has changed. 下列清單將描述一些常見的執行個體的個人化，可能導致屬性傳回的值`true`，這表示，控制項有某些變更個人化資料：The following list describes some common instances of personalization that would cause the property to return a value of `true`, indicating that the control has some changed personalization data: - 關閉靜態頁面上，控制項 （或伺服器或使用者控制項）。Closing a static control (or server or user control) on a page. - 還原已關閉的靜態回到頁面從頁面類別目錄的控制項。Restoring a closed static control from a page catalog back to a page. - 在其區域內，或另一個區域，請移動任何控制項。Moving any control within its zone or to another zone. - 將控制項加入從目錄或伺服器控制項，或以程式設計方式加入控制項。Adding a control from a catalog of or server controls, or adding a control programmatically. - 建立兩個連接控制項，以程式設計方式或使用連接的使用者介面 (UI)。Creating a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection user interface (UI). - 刪除兩個連接控制項，以程式設計方式或使用連接 UI。Deleting a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection UI. 若要存取這個屬性值，您必須轉換控制項執行個體介面; 您可以再讀取屬性值。To access this property value, you must cast the control instance to the interface; you can then read the property value. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範簡單的使用方式的屬性，以表示某些常見的網頁個人化執行個體且導致變更控制項的個人化資料。The following code example demonstrates a simple usage of the property, to indicate some common page personalization instances that cause a control's personalization data to change. 程式碼範例包含四個部分：The code example has four parts: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更包含 Web 組件控制項的頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that allows you to change display modes on a page that contains Web Parts controls. - 包含兩個自訂的程式碼的原始程式檔可連接控制項和介面。A source file that contains the code for two custom controls that can be connected, and an interface. - 裝載的所有控制項的網頁。A Web page that hosts all the controls. - 程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the code example works. 程式碼範例的第一個部分是使用者控制項變更顯示模式。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 您可以從範例 > 一節的取得使用者控制項的原始程式碼類別概觀。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 顯示模式和使用者控制項的運作方式的相關資訊，請參閱[逐步解說： 變更 Web 組件頁面上顯示的模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 此範例的第二個部分是原始程式檔，以自訂控制項和介面。The second part of the example is the source file with the custom controls and the interface. 請注意，`IZipCode`介面會公開一種方法，並為此方法實作中自訂`ZipCodeWebPart`控制項做為回呼方法以啟用`ZipCodeWebPart`做為連接案例中的提供者。Notice that the `IZipCode` interface exposes one method, and that this method as implemented in the custom `ZipCodeWebPart` control serves as a callback method to enable `ZipCodeWebPart` to act as a provider in a connection scenario. 另一個控制項`WeatherWebPart`，做為取用者控制連接; 它可以使用所提供的特定介面`ZipCodeWebPart`。The other control, `WeatherWebPart`, acts as the consumer control in a connection; it can consume the particular interface provided by `ZipCodeWebPart`. 在實際應用，`WeatherWebPart`無法使用個人化的郵遞區號值從提供者，然後再提供圖形化的氣象資訊給使用者。In a real application, `WeatherWebPart` could consume a personalized ZIP Code value from the provider, and then provide graphical weather information to users. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確地進行編譯，並將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您的網站 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 這個程式碼範例會使用動態編譯。因此，請注意，`Register`頂端網頁上的此元件的指示詞只能包含`TagPrefix`和`Namespace`屬性，而不`Assembly`屬性。This code example uses dynamic compilation; therefore, notice that the `Register` directive for this component at the top of the Web page contains only `TagPrefix` and `Namespace` attributes, without an `Assembly` attribute. 如需示範如何編譯的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說： 開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 程式碼範例的第三個部分是 Web 網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，它包含兩個區域，其中包含兩個自訂的第一個控制項。Notice that it contains two zones, with the first one containing the two custom controls. 另外還有區域，其中包含標準使用者可以將頁面加入的控制項。There is also a zone, which contains a standard control that users can add to the page. ``項目會提供 UI，讓使用者能夠建立控制項之間的連接的連接。The `` element provides a connection UI for users to create connections between controls. 在`Page_PreRender`方法，請注意，若要查看是否已變更個人化資料，而且如果是，它會檢查更新的文字`Label1`。In the `Page_PreRender` method, notice that it checks to see whether the personalization data has changed and, if so, updates the text of `Label1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/wpmgrIsDirtyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/wpmgrIsDirtyVB.aspx#1)] 在瀏覽器頁面載入之後，嘗試建立一些會變更個人化資料本主題的 < 備註 > 一節所列的案例。After you load the page in a browser, try to create some of the scenarios listed in the Remarks section of this topic that will change the personalization data. 當您進行各種變更時變更涉及所追蹤的個人化案例的其中一個,控制，文字`Label1`控制項顯示，指出已變更個人化資料。As you make various changes, when a change involves one of the personalization scenarios tracked by the control, the text of the `Label1` control is displayed to indicate that personalization data has changed. 例如，您可以：For example, you can: - 按一下控制項之間建立連線**連接 web 組件控制項** 按鈕。Create a connection between controls by clicking the **Connect WebPart Controls** button. - 使用**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項以將頁面切換至目錄的模式，並加入**我的行事曆**第二個控制項區域。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control to the second zone. - 變更頁面回瀏覽模式中，按一下功能表的動詞命令 （顯示在標題列中的箭頭符號） 的**我的行事曆**控制項，然後選取**關閉**關閉它，並將其加入至頁面類別目錄。Change the page back to browse mode, click on the verbs menu (shown with an arrow symbol in the title bar) for the **My Calendar** control, and select **Close** to close it and add it to the page catalog. - 將網頁傳回給目錄的模式，並加入**我的行事曆**回到頁面的控制項。Return the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control back to the page. - 使用**顯示模式**控制，將頁面切換到設計模式，並拖曳其中一個或多個檔案至另一個區域，或相同區域中的不同位置，重新排列控制項的配置。Use the **Display Mode** control to switch the page to design mode, and rearrange the layout of the controls by dragging one or more of them to another zone, or to a different position in the same zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是實作方法，它提供的 Web 組件控制項設定為直接存取受保護的方法方法。This method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 呼叫這個方法時，它會儲存自訂的個人化的資料受控制項，而且先前儲存在永久的資料存放區初始化程序中稍後使用。When this method is called, it stores the custom personalized data that is managed by the control, and that was previously saved in the permanent data store for use later in the initialization process. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，頁面和控制項的開發人員程式碼不會不需要呼叫這個方法，因為主要是由 Web 組件控制項設定為擷取個人化資料的機制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for retrieving personalization data.

para.span: 讓開發人員會使用這個方法的其中一個情況是如果他們正在開發一個自訂的個人化架構，以用來取代一個由提供 Web 組件控制項集合。

span.span: One scenario in which developers would use this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set.

para.span: 在這種情況下，開發人員無法繼承自類別並覆寫方法傳回的自訂實作物件。

span.span: In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object.

para.span: 自訂物件會呼叫的實作在適當的時間載入自訂的個人化資料的方法。

span.span: The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to load custom personalization data.

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data that is managed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是實作方法，它提供的 Web 組件控制項設定為直接存取受保護的方法方法。The method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 呼叫這個方法時，它會將儲存所管理的所有個人化的資料Web 組件的應用程式設定的永久資料儲存區的控制項。When this method is called, it saves all personalized data that is managed by the control to the permanent data store configured for a Web Parts application. > [!NOTE] > 在大部分情況下，頁面和控制項的開發人員程式碼不會不需要呼叫這個方法，因為主要是由 Web 組件控制項設定為儲存個人化資料的機制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for saving personalization data.

para.span: 開發人員會使用這個方法的其中一個情況是如果他們正在開發一個自訂的個人化架構，以用來取代一個由提供 Web 組件控制項集合。

span.span: One scenario in which developers would work with this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set.

para.span: 在這種情況下，開發人員無法繼承自類別並覆寫方法傳回的自訂實作物件。

span.span: In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object.

para.span: 自訂物件會呼叫的實作在適當的時間來儲存自訂的個人化資料的方法。

span.span: The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to save the custom personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Control 覆寫基底屬性一律會傳回值為`true`如屬性。The control overrides the base property to always return a value of `true` for the property. 即使控制項本身不可見，屬性必須設為`true`使其所有子控制項都都預設為可見。Even though the control itself is not visible, the property needs to be set to `true` so that all its child controls are visible by default. 如果您嘗試設定的值屬性，它一定會產生錯誤因為控制項已覆寫基底屬性行為，並防止任何值指派給屬性。If you try to set the value of the property, it always generates an error because the control has overridden the base property behavior and prevents assigning any value to the property. 這個屬性不是在視覺化設計工具，可繫結，但可在執行階段繫結。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱。For more information, see .

exception.span: An attempt was made to assign a value to the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdded As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a dynamic or other server control has been added to a zone, to indicate that the control was added successfully.

span.span: Occurs after a dynamic or other server control has been added to a zone, to indicate that the control was added successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用於指出動態控制項 （以程式設計的方式，加入，而不是在網頁標記中所宣告的控制項） 是否已成功新增至區域。The event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully added to a zone. 搭配方法，這個事件提供開發人員一種方式更新使用者介面 (UI) 或否則通知使用者已成功加入控制項。In conjunction with the method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdding As WebPartAddingEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of adding a dynamic or other server control to a zone.

span.span: Occurs during the process of adding a dynamic or other server control to a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件開始新增控制項至區域的程序之後的方法。The event is raised by the method after the process of adding a control to a zone has begun. 此事件會提供完成之前取消此程序的機會。This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete. 如果成功加入程序，此事件後面接著事件。If the adding process is successful, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以提供事件的自訂處理常式加`OnWebPartAdding`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosed As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs when a control (or server or user control) is removed from a page.

span.span: Occurs when a control (or server or user control) is removed from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件表示，控制項已經成功地關閉，依使用者或以程式設計的方式。The event indicates that a control has been successfully closed, either by a user or programmatically. 若要關閉控制是指從頁面移除，而不轉譯時，也將它放在特殊持有物件稱為頁面類別目錄。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 頁面目錄中，對應至控制項，維護參考至已關閉每一頁的控制項。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果宣告內的頁面上的控制項區域，使用者可以將頁面切換至目錄的顯示模式，並將任何先前已關閉的控制項加入至頁面。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch a page into catalog display mode, and add back to a page any controls that were previously closed. 事件相關聯方法，這個方法會引發事件，而且提供的處理常式。The event is associated with the method, which both raises the event and provides a handler for it. 網頁開發人員可以加入，將自訂事件處理常式`OnWebPartClosed`屬性``項目 頁面上，然後將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosing As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of removing a control (or server or user control) from a page.

span.span: Occurs during the process of removing a control (or server or user control) from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件方法時控制項正在關閉控制。The event is raised by the method when the control is in the process of closing a control. 如果成功移除控制項，此事件後面接著事件。If the removal of the control is successful, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以提供自訂事件處理常式加入`OnWebPartClosed`屬性加入 <`asp:webpartmanager>`項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常，當就會引發事件的直接結果的使用者關閉控制項，可以取消事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user closing a control, the event can be cancelled. 不過，是無法取消事件中的案例。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果就在刪除控制項它所包含的控制項必須全部關閉，否則它們會被遺棄。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在此情況下控制關閉控制項，不是使用者。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user. 與時機控制項正在呼叫方法，關閉每個控制項，而就會引發事件，事件無法取消 （符合設計），因為必須完成的清除工作所有區域的控制項。And when the control is in the process of calling the method to close each control, and the event is raised, the event cannot be cancelled (by design) because the needs to complete the task of cleaning up all the zone's controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartDeleted As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a or other server control has been deleted from a zone.

span.span: Occurs after a or other server control has been deleted from a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可用於指出動態控制項 （以程式設計的方式，加入，而不是在網頁標記中所宣告的控制項） 是否已成功刪除從區域。The event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully deleted from a zone. 搭配方法，這個事件會提供一種方式，來更新使用者介面 (UI) 或否則通知使用者已成功刪除控制項的開發人員。In conjunction with the method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartDeleting As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of permanently deleting an instance of a dynamic or other server control from a zone.

span.span: Occurs during the process of permanently deleting an instance of a dynamic or other server control from a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件方法，刪除動態控制項 （一個以程式設計方式或透過 Web 組件的使用者介面的使用者已加入） 的過程。The event is raised by the method, during the process of deleting a dynamic control (one that has been added programmatically or by a user through the Web Parts user interface). 事件會提供完成之前取消此程序的機會。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is finished. 如果順利完成刪除程序，此事件後面接著事件。If the deletion process is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以提供事件的自訂處理常式加`OnWebPartDeleting`屬性``項目 頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartMoved As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a or server control has been moved to a different location on a Web page.

span.span: Occurs after a or server control has been moved to a different location on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks （在網頁標記中宣告） 的靜態和動態控制項適用於此事件。This event applies to both static (declared in the markup of a Web page) and dynamic controls. 相關聯方法。It is associated with the method. 移動完成之後，就會引發事件，因為開發人員可以包含提供給使用者、 驗證或執行其他動作的相關通知的事件處理常式。Because the event is raised after a move is complete, developers can include an event handler to provide some notification to users, some validation, or some other actions. 若要加入事件處理常式，您可以加入`OnWebPartMoved`屬性``元素在頁面上，並指派給屬性的自訂方法的名稱。To add an event handler, you can add an `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assign the name of a custom method to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartMoving As WebPartMovingEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of moving a or other server control that is contained in a zone.

span.span: Occurs during the process of moving a or other server control that is contained in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件時或它自己的區域內，或另一個區域，移動其他伺服器控制項。The event is raised when a or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone. 當使用者拖曳控制項，及以程式設計方式移動時，也可能會發生。This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move. 就會引發事件方法，這個方法，並提供完成之前取消移動程序的機會。The event is raised by the method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete. 如果已完成的移動，並放在新位置的控制項，此事件後面是事件。If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以建立自訂事件處理常式加入`OnWebPartMoving`屬性``項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebParts As WebPartCollection

summary.span: Gets a reference to all controls tracked by the control on a Web page.

span.span: Gets a reference to all controls tracked by the control on a Web page.

value.span: A ，其中包含一組參考控制項。

span.span: A that contains references to a set of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供控制項以追蹤所有內所包含的控制項網頁的區域。The property is used by the control to track all controls that are contained within zones on the page. 集合是唯讀的雖然您可以存取個別以程式設計方式控制透過它們集合並變更。Although the collection is read-only, you can access individual controls through the collection and make changes to them programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 很可能有之外的頁面上的控制項置於區域使用，這會導致控制項沒有追蹤所參考或控制其集合。It is possible to have a control placed on a page outside of a zone, which results in the control not being tracked by the control or referenced in its collection. 不過，沒有什麼道理使用控制項區域外,，因為它然後失去其 Web 組件的功能，並做為一般的伺服器控制項。However, there is little reason to use a control outside of a zone, because it then loses its Web Parts functionality and acts as a normal server control. 任何類型的控制項，可放置在區域中，是否自訂控制項、 標準的 ASP.NET 控制項、 使用者控制項或自訂伺服器控制項，可用來當做控制項在執行階段。Any type of control that can be placed in a zone, whether a custom control, a standard ASP.NET control, a user control, or a custom server control, can be treated as a control at run time. 控制項時，不是控制項放入區域，在 ASP.NET 包裝的控制項的執行階段物件，使控制項可以如同真正控制項。When a control that is not a control is placed in a zone, at run time ASP.NET wraps the control with a object, so that the control can behave as a true control. 因此，藉由屬性，控制項可以追蹤任何類型的伺服器控制項，不論是否衍生自類別。Therefore, by using the property, the control can track any type of server control, regardless of whether it derives from the class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式來存取個別控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual controls. 請注意，在網頁的宣告式標記內``有項目是兩個標準的 ASP.NET 伺服器控制項。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, within the `` element there are two standard ASP.NET server controls. 雖然這些不會繼承自類別，因為它們是將各加上方區域中物件在執行階段，並因此將會包含在所參考的集合屬性。Although these do not inherit from the class, because they are in a zone they will be wrapped with a object at run time, and thus will be included in the collection referenced by the property. 您也可以加入自訂控制項、 使用者控制項或自訂伺服器控制中的這個區域中，並且會處理這些相同的方式。You could also add custom controls, user controls, or custom server controls in this zone, and they would be handled the same way. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/CS/wpmgrWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/VB/wpmgrWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 請注意，工作的程式碼範例，您必須新增設定，若要啟用匯出 Web 組件描述檔案的 Web.config 檔案中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 確定您具有網頁上的相同目錄中的 Web.config 檔案，此程式碼範例。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 內``區段中，請確定沒有``具有項目`enableExport`屬性設為`true`，在下列標記中。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 您載入網頁瀏覽器中，如果您按一下之後**WebPart 計數**按鈕時，程式碼會使用屬性集合中傳回控制項的計數。After you load the page into a browser, if you click the **WebPart Count** button, the code uses the property to return the count of controls in the collection. 如果您按一下**隱藏日曆標題**按鈕時，程式碼會變更行事曆，讓它只會以框線和標題不會呈現。If you click the **Hide Calendar Title** button, the code changes the calendar so that it renders with only a border and not a title.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a specific connection has been established between controls (or server or user controls).

span.span: Occurs after a specific connection has been established between controls (or server or user controls).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件相關聯方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件很有用，因為您知道連接完成之後，您可能想要通知使用者的事實，或甚至變更頁面的使用者介面 (UI)。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is complete, you might want to inform the user of the fact, or even change the user interface (UI) of the page. 例如，您可能想要顯示特定圖形影像，表示成功連接兩個控制項，或顯示簡短訊息，然後將頁面顯示模式變更回瀏覽模式。For example, you might want to display some graphic image that suggests a successful connection between two controls, or display a brief message, and then change the page display mode back to browse mode. 網頁開發人員可以關聯的自訂事件處理常式與此事件加入`OnWebPartsConnected`屬性``項目頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of creating a connection between controls (or server or user controls placed in a zone).

span.span: Occurs during the process of creating a connection between controls (or server or user controls placed in a zone).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件方法，以及它會通知已開始連線程序 （例如，使用者已選取的控制項並按一下連接的動詞命令），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 這個事件會提供完成之前取消連線的機會。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果已成功完成連線，此事件後面接著事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以加入，將自訂事件處理常式`OnWebPartsConnecting`屬性``項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs after a connection between two or server controls has been terminated.

span.span: Occurs after a connection between two or server controls has been terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件相關聯方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件很有用，因為您知道連接終止之後，您可能想要通知使用者、 在程式碼中，執行某些清除動作，或在使用者介面 (UI) 中進行其他變更。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is terminated, you might want to inform the user, perform some cleanup actions in the code, or make other changes in the user interface (UI). 網頁開發人員可以關聯的自訂事件處理常式與此事件加入`OnWebPartsDisConnected`屬性``項目頁面上，指定給該屬性的自訂方法名稱。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: Occurs during the process of ending the connection between previously connected or server controls.

span.span: Occurs during the process of ending the connection between previously connected or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 就會引發事件方法，並發出訊號事實使用者已按一下中斷連線動詞或否則呼叫方法。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 這個事件會提供取消處理程序完成之前結束連接的機會。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果連接就會順利結束，此事件後面接著事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 網頁開發人員可以加入，將自訂事件處理常式`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`屬性``項目，並將自訂的方法名稱指派給屬性。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常，當直接結束連接的使用者動作的結果就會引發事件，可以取消事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that ends a connection, the event can be cancelled. 不過，有幾個案例中不能取消事件。However, there are several scenarios in which the event cannot be cancelled. 第一個案例是，如果就在刪除控制項它所包含的控制項必須全部關閉，否則它們會被遺棄。The first scenario is, if a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在此情況下控制關閉控制項、 不使用者，和它也必須能夠終止的任何連接控制項沒有任何可能發生的中斷連線，讓它能完成的清除和關閉程序所有控制項。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must also be able to terminate the connections of any connected controls without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up and closing all the controls. 因此，根據設計方法無法在此案例中取消。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 相關事件可取消，請參閱事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event. 中的第二個案例無法取消事件時呼叫方法時 （這稱為期間每個要求頁面時，例如），並沒有某種類型的頁面上的現有連線中的衝突。The second scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled is when the method is called (this called during each request to a page, for example), and there is some type of conflict in the existing connections on a page. 比方說，可能是使用者連線到控制項 y 的控制項 x，但共用的使用者控制項來控制 z，x 連接和控制 x 尚不允許建立多個連接。For example, perhaps a user connects control x to control y, but a shared user connects control x to control z, and yet control x is not allowed to form multiple connections. 在此情況下，個別使用者的連線設定的優先順序，而控制項解決衝突，藉由呼叫方法和結束之間的連線 x 和 z 特定的使用者。In this case, the individual user's settings for the connection take precedence, and the control resolves the conflict by calling the method and ending the connection between x and z for the particular user. 這個中斷連線基本的設計來解決衝突，所以無法在此案例中取消事件。Because this disconnection is essential to resolving the conflict, by design the event cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 第三個的案例，其中方法無法取消時或目前連接的伺服器控制項刪除或已關閉。The third scenario in which the method cannot be cancelled is when a or server control that is currently connected is either deleted or closed. 因為控制項一定會從網頁中移除，所以邏輯上也来移除其連線。Because the control is definitely going to be removed from the page, it is a logical necessity to remove its connection. 因此，當控制項叫用方法，進而引發事件，根據設計有不是可能取消事件。Therefore, when the control invokes the method, which in turn raises the event, by design there is no possibility of canceling the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性供控制項以追蹤網頁上的區域。The property is used by the control to track the zones on a Web page. 請注意屬性並未參考所有類型的區域。它會參考衍生自的區域類別，包括區域。Note that the property does not reference all types of zones; it references only zones that derive from the class, including zones. 雖然屬性所參考的集合是唯讀，但您可以使用它來存取集合中的個別物件和程式設計方式使用它們。Although the collection referenced by the property is read-only, you can use it to access the individual objects in the collection and work with them programmatically. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性以程式設計方式來存取個別區域控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual zone controls. 請注意，在宣告式 Web 網頁標記中，有兩個``項目，每個都包含伺服器控制項。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, there are two `` elements, each containing a server control. 在`
